description: The main protagonist of Tokimeki Memorial: Only Love. A second-year student in class 2-A at Tsugumi High School Before transferring to Tsugumi, Riku used to live in a snowy harbour in the northeast of Hokkaido. He is often a target of a series of bizarre events and races administered by the school council. Also, he is the object of affection in the eyes of the other characters.
name: Aoba Riku
